title: Bug 15705Editor with focus, tab text disappears sometimes
OB: Bug 15705Editor with focus, tab text disappears sometimes WinMe, large fonts setting, 1280x1024, True color (32 bit)Strangely, editor tabs with focus for files which start with the letter "W"disappear when there are many editors. ]Selecting another tab makes the text visible.This is only true for a fewfilesthis isn't a textcolor = backgroundcolor problem.
